title: Ministry of Foreign Affairs celebrates 61st anniversary of Victory Day
text: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the National Community Abroad organized, Sunday, a ceremony as part of the celebration of the 61st anniversary of the Victory Day, chaired by the Minister Ahmed Attaf, in the presence of officials and staff of the Ministry, moudjahidine and diplomats.

After laying a wreath of flowers in front of the commemorative stele and reciting the Fatiha of the Holy Quran, a minute of silence was observed in memory of the Chouhada of the Revolution of National Liberation.
The new version of the electronic websites of the diplomatic and consular missions of Algeria abroad was launched on this occasion.
